body_html:
Telemetry experiments are shown in about:support to help QA as well as other teams to diagnose issues with Firefox caused by those experiments:

Since preference experiments modify Firefox behavior without leaving another visible artifact in about:support (like an add-on), we should figure out how to list ourselves on the page as well.

@bsmedberg Who would end up using this / can help us spec out our requirements? Is it you?
title: Show preference experiments in about:support
body: Telemetry experiments are shown in about:support to help QA as well as other teams to diagnose issues with Firefox caused by those experiments: Since preference experiments modify Firefox behavior without leaving another visible artifact in about:support (like an add-on), we should figure out how to list ourselves on the page as well. @bsmedberg Who would end up using this / can help us spec out our requirements? Is it you?
